daily_activities: Arrival in Ujjain and check-in to hotel
Explore the nearby areas and get a feel of the city
Start the day with a visit to the Kal Bhairav Temple
Go for a trek to the nearby hills and enjoy adventure sports like rock climbing
Enjoy the nightlife at a local pub or bar
Visit the Harsiddhi Temple and learn about its history
Take part in water sports like kayaking or paddle boating at the Shipra River
Explore the local market and try some street food
Take a day trip to the nearby town of Mandu and explore its historical sites
Go for a hot air balloon ride and enjoy the scenic views of the city
Enjoy a night of stargazing at a local observatory
Visit the ISKCON Temple and attend a morning prayer session
Go for a cycling tour of the city and explore its scenic routes

travel_instructions.route_details: The most common route from Ahmedabad to Ujjain is via the Ahmedabad-Indore highway. You can take a train from Ahmedabad Railway Station to Ujjain Railway Station or a bus from Ahmedabad's Geetamandir Bus Depot to Ujjain Bus Stand.
